freshness.name: freshness
freshness.description: quality and freshness of ingredients, especially fish
freshness.summary: Customers consistently praise Test Restaurant for the exceptional freshness of their food, particularly highlighting the salmon sushi as "incredible" and "so fresh." The feedback reflects a very positive sentiment regarding the restaurant's commitment to using high-quality, fresh ingredients. Based on the available reviews, freshness appears to be a notable strength that enhances the overall dining experience.
